author: Shivani Vora
title: Three Reasons to (Still) Visit Puerto Rico
text:
Puerto Rico faces a potentially crippling financial crisis that is drawing compari sons with Greece. We’ve asked travel experts to share their perspective on how the crisis will affect the island’s $7 billion tourism industry. So if you’re planning a trip to Puerto Rico, here are three things to keep in mind.
